ComicInfo.Summary:
It all comes down to this! The Authority finds their way home at long last. There have been hard lessons along the way across time and space, but will they learn the right warnings from them? Or will the team grow into the horrors they've beheld? Find out in this conclusion to the ultimate Authority story from writers Grant Morrison and Keith Giffen and an all-star line-up of the industry's top illustrators!
